Input::BaseInputDevice

Input::BaseInputDevice< Listener > Class Template Reference

List of all members.

Detailed Description

template<class Listener>
class Input::BaseInputDevice< Listener >

For internal use only.

Abstract Base class to all input devices. Provides event listeners management. Template parameters:

  • Listener: Listener class that this devices manages


Public Member Functions

 Destructor. Class release.

void addListener (Listener *pListener)
 Adds a listener for the events received in this input device.
void removeListener (Listener *pListener)
 Removes a listener previously registered to receive the input events of this device.
void removeAllListeners ()
 Removes all registered listeners.

void Input::BaseInputDevice< Listener >::addListener ( Listener *  pListener  ) 

Adds a listener for the events received in this input device.

For internal use only.

Parameters:
